channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 2nd May
item.description:
NWD WITH GIVE AN TAKE PLUS TEMPORARY FOOTWAY CLOSURE NEEDED PLEASE MAKE SAFE WITH TEMPORARY TARMAC OVER COVER AS BARRIERS WHICH ARE NEXT TO NUMBER 368 KEEP GETTING MOVED AN DAMAGED A SECTION 81 HAS BEEN RAISED FOR THIS TO BE REPAIRED (Damaged Street Furniture)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Road Markings problem, 2nd May
item.description:
28 day with road closure needed please refresh give way markings appropriately 10 metres (Faded Road Markings)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 2nd May
item.description:
